review_and_appreciate:
Review and Appreciate: Did you “feel into\" your experience of being present at any time yesterday? Take
            The Path.
quote: "Life is trying things to see if they work." Ray Bradbury

step_of_the_day.title:
Give yourself the opportunity to experiment today. Find a way to move outside your boundaries (Pillar #8
            & 9)
step_of_the_day.content:
We take life so seriously. And of course, there is good reason to; especially these days. But “serious\"
            locks us into rigidness and a reluctance to step into new territory and growth. Resilience involves the
            ability to be flexible, open to new approaches and finding your rhythm.

action_step:
Give yourself the opportunity to move outside your boundaries today. Take a step, an action, that is new or
            different for you. From the place of your healthy internal parent, give yourself permission to try this new
            behavior or approach, and let it be ok that it might not work out. But any new step you take will be, at the
            very least, a learning experience. This will support your healthy growth.
journal_entry: Write about your willingness to try something new.
